name: AI AppGen in Retool
tagline: Build editable secure schema-aware dashboards via plain text
description: Build production-ready apps from natural language using your real data, in your cloud, with enterprise security and governance built in. Start building with AI that knows your stack.

name: QA.tech 1.0
tagline: Stop breaking prod, build & test with a fleet of QA agents
description: Get a fleet of QA agents that protect your product’s quality. Let AI explore your app for full test coverage, monitor staging to catch issues, and deliver debugging context as soon as you open your PRs. Build at full speed and never break prod again.

name: The Brief
tagline: AI agents that research, design, launch, and improve ads
description: An AI agency in your browser. The Brief helps you discover insights, generate creatives, launch everywhere, and optimize results, continuously. No handoffs, no tool chaos, just smarter campaigns, faster. Built by marketers for marketers.

name: ProhostAI
tagline: AI assistant for Airbnb messaging, tasks, and cleanings
description: ProhostAI – all‑in‑one AI assistant for guest messaging, maintenance, cleanings, upsells & guidebooks so vacation rental hosts can scale stress‑free. Available on web, iOS and Android for hosts on Airbnb, Hostaway, Guesty, Hospitable and OwnerRez.

name: TyCal
tagline: A peek at your Apple Calendar right from the menu bar
description: TyCal gives you a lightning-fast, read-only peek at your Apple Calendar — right from the menu bar. Stay on top of your schedule with a clean design, multiple views, and full privacy. No switching apps. No clutter. Just instant clarity.

name: Rately
tagline: Take control of your API traffic with custom rate limits.
description: Enterprise-grade rate limiting service built on Cloudflare. Define rate limits by user ID, API key, or any custom parameter. Drop-in integration with ~25ms latency.

name: Promptius AI
tagline: Build production-grade AI agents using natural language
description: Promptius is an AI-powered development environment designed to build and deploy autonomous agents based on user prompts.

name: Palteca
tagline: All-new Spanish learning app that bans translations
description: We launched a year ago, and now we’ve rebuilt everything. Real native speakers replace stock videos. Guided Immersion shows usage not translations. Daily fluency insights beyond the app, real fluency needs more than an app.

name: Sports Mappedia
tagline: Find upcoming sports events near you, visualized on a map
description: Sports Mappedia™ was created as a free and easy to use central place with all relevant locations for major sports events on one map. It can be used for gathering information, travel planning or just exploration. Not official, built by fans for the fans.

name: Bloop
tagline: Let's make a blooper!
description: Bloop is your AI blooper studio: turn photos into hilarious micro-videos in seconds. Upload a pic, pick an idea, and share laugh-out-loud bloops with friends. From selfie to shareable video in under a minute.

name: Noet
tagline: Catch bugs before your customers do
description: Noet turns your plain English user stories into automated tests that mimic real user behavior. Find critical bugs early, so you can release products your customers love.

name: AnyStory
tagline: Grow your authentic LinkedIn brand with only 5 mins/day
description: AnyStory learns from your past stories and current trends to create personalized LinkedIn strategies and post ideas for you. Turn ideas into drafts, get AI feedback to sound more like you, and post daily without writer’s block. All in just 5 minutes a day.

name: Synapt
tagline: Find viral posts & reply with AI to grow 3× faster
description: Synapt is a Chrome extension that helps creators spot viral posts early on X, LinkedIn & Product Hunt, then craft AI replies/posts that sound like you. Grow your audience faster while saving 70% of the time you’d normally spend scrolling and replying.

name: Graviton
tagline: Gravity Themed Image Compression
description: This is my very first project launch - Graviton. It is an image compression application supporting advanced settings and format conversion. Try it out!

name: Dragonfly
tagline: Find the Right Tool for Your Tech Stack
description: Dragonfly is an AI-powered platform that delivers personalised, unbiased software recommendations from a catalogue of 250K+ tools, tailored to your team's exact needs. Stop guessing. Start building.

name: Ledger IQ
tagline: Smart bookkeeping powered by AI
description: Ledger IQ is a AI-powered bookkeeping app designed for entrepreneurs, tracking transactions, sending invoices, and financial reporting. Its conversational AI analyzes your business and provides tailored insights and tips to keep you on top of your finances.

name: Gemini 2.5 Computer Use
tagline: The GUI-native AI agent
description: Gemini 2.5 Computer Use is a new specialized model from Google that powers AI agents to interact with graphical user interfaces. It takes screenshots and user goals as input and generates actions like clicks and typing to automate tasks on websites and apps.

name: Webstudio Inception
tagline: Creative web design exploration with AI backed by code
description: Inception is a new kind of tool for creative web design exploration with AI that lets you experiment with ideas backed by production-grade code. What you see on the canvas is exactly what you get in production - because it’s real code rendering in your browser

name: Introducing Dromos Console
tagline: Build your personalized agent in 10 minutes in plain English
description: Today, we're announcing our launch of Dromos Console. It's a self-serve AI platform that automates knowledge works and give users the ability to build personalized agents in just 10 minutes, no code, no crazy drag n drop, just plain English

name: SimplePerf • AI performance reviews
tagline: Simple, guided performance reviews for startups.
description: A lightweight 360° performance review tool made for small teams. AI-guided feedback, smart reminders, and Slack integration, so you can run reviews in minutes, not weeks thanks to ready-to-use templates.

name: AI AppGen in Retool
tagline: Build editable secure schema-aware dashboards via plain text
description: Build production-ready apps from natural language using your real data, in your cloud, with enterprise security and governance built in. Start building with AI that knows your stack.
